properties.entry: "select event.id, event.name, event.description, event.start,event.end, event.type, event.ticketprice, event.seatsavailable,event.place from event,museum" + "where event.place=museum.name"
"select event.id, event.name, event.description, event.start,event.end, event.type, event.ticketprice, event.seatsavailable,event.place from event,zoo" + "where event.place=zoo.name"
"select event.id, event.name, event.description, event.start,event.end, event.type, event.ticketprice, event.seatsavailable,event.place from event,park" + "where event.place=park.name"
"select event.id, event.name, event.description, event.start,event.end, event.type, event.ticketprice, event.seatsavailable,event.place from event,theater" + "where event.place=theater.name"
"select event.id, event.name, event.description, event.start,event.end, event.type, event.ticketprice, event.seatsavailable,event.place from event,stadium" + "where event.place=stadium.name"

"select event.id, event.name, event.description, event.start,event.end, event.type, event.ticketprice, event.seatsavailable,event.place from event,largebusiness" + "where event.place=largebusiness.name"

"select event.id, event.name, event.description, event.start,event.end, event.type, event.ticketprice, event.seatsavailable,event.place from event,touristattraction" + "where event.place=touristattraction.name"

"select event.id, event.name, event.description, event.start,event.end, event.type, event.ticketprice, event.seatsavailable,event.place from event,traditionalmarket" + "where event.place=traditionalmarket.name"
select userId from user "+" where userName = ? "+"and password=?;
update user set password = ? "+" where userId = ?;
update user set firstName = ? "+" lastName = ? "+" dni = ? "+" email = ? "+" phoneNumber = ? "+" adress = ? "+"where userId = ?;
